title: Scully, Monday, Kershaw honored in LA
subtitle: Scully, Monday, Kershaw honored in LA
body: LOS ANGELES -- Dodgers announcers Vin Scully and Rick Monday were honored at Monday's 21st annual Southern California Sports Broadcasters Awards Luncheon, as was 2011 National League Cy Young Award winner Clayton Kershaw.  Scully, about to launch his 63rd season at the microphone, was chosen as the best radio play-by-play announcer for the 13th time.  Monday, starting his 19th season in the Dodgers booth, was honored for radio color commentary. Kershaw received the Chuck Benedict Outstanding Achievement Award for his record-breaking season. Ken Gurnick is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Ken Gurnick
